comment: @Molson_Hart @futurepundit Phones feel like they reached the point of diminishing returns on new models a few years ago.  I'm still running a Galaxy 7 that I'll ride until it dies.Phones are basically PCs now. Time to switch projections from hockey-stick to logistic.
@futurepundit This is not a supply issue. Its a demand problem.

@futurepundit The two big console launches for next Fall from Sony and Microsoft are going to get headlines if they're delayed. Some game ports have already been delayed due to the contractors being in quarantine zones.
